name: Datenight Deadline
description:
The robot skull ninjas have taken your girl! Fight through the mean streets of the city to bring 'your' girl back safely!

Punch enemies in the face to charge your ultimate ability, and then launch enemies into each other to deal some extra cheeky damage!

Datenight Deadline is my submission to GBJam 5.

Controls

WASD/Cursor Keys - Movement

Z - Attack

Known Bugs

There's no restart menu when you run out of health.
